received a copy it along with Solcore. If not, see http://www.gnu.org/licenses/.

If you find this software useful and help you produce any scientific
publication, please cite the initial Solcore paper at:

“Solcore: A multi-scale, python-based library for modelling solar cells
and semiconductor materials”
D. Alonso-Alvarez, T. Wilson, P. Pearce, M. Führer, D. Farrell and N. Ekins-Daukes.
Journal of Computational Electronics (2018) https://doi.org/10.1007/s10825-018-1171-3
